channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vance's next moves
item.description: Vice President JD Vance plans to literally fly above MAGA's rising civil war — campaigning coast to coast in the midterms and sticking close to Presid...

item.title: How energy powers your AI work and fun: a step-by-step guide
item.description: AI feels like magic — largely because most of us don't understand how it really works. Why it matters : This story will radically break down the proce...

item.title: Trump: Russia and Ukraine peace talks in "final stages"
item.description: President Trump said at the top of his Sunday meeting with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky that the U.S. is "in the final stages" of peace talk...

item.title: Minimum wage will rise in 19 states starting Jan. 1
item.description: Data: National Employment Law Project ; Map: Kavya Beheraj/Axios Workers in 19 states are in line for a raise when minimum wage increases take effect ...

item.title: Anxiety fuels Gen Z's retirement planning
item.description: Gen Z is investing in their retirement , but anxiety— not prudent financial planning — is often the motivator. The big picture: Young workers have sta...

item.title: Trump meets Zelensky at Mar-a-Lago between Putin calls
item.description: The president sounded optimistic about a deal to end Russia’s almost four-year-old invasion while sharing no new specifics.

item.title: ICE shift in tactics leads to soaring number of at-large arrests, data shows
item.description: The agency has moved away from focusing on arresting migrants at local jails to tracking them down in communities, a Washington Post analysis found.

item.title: Zelensky says he will meet Trump soon, citing progress in peace plan
item.description: The Sunday meeting suggests that Washington and Kyiv are closing in on a joint position to end the war. Russia, however, will probably reject the plan...

item.title: Kennedy, other Trump officials balk at requests to testify on Capitol Hill
item.description: Democrats have suggested the lack of testimony is yet another way the administration is snubbing the legislative branch.

item.title: Trump aides’ official religious messages for Christmas draw objections
item.description: Explicitly sectarian religious messages for Christmas on official government social media accounts drew complaints from advocates for church-state sep...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino
item.description: President Donald Trump will give a speech in Northeastern Pennsylvania on Tuesday, the first stop in a ‘tour’ where he will talk about affordability c...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
